website_summaries.verdict: The Nylite 2 Plus is a definite crowd-pleaser that still carries that edgy yet posh styling popularized by Bjorn Borg on the court, although updated here with contemporary touches to add more pizzazz. The much-touted comfort level of the original remains the same, but the shoe has grown lighter.Since it’s covered in leather, ample support can be found. The sneaker runs long but provides a fit that’s comfortable even for wide-footed users. The only real disappointment with the shoe is that the gold detail looks more like silver.
pros: Nearly all who reviewed the Tretorn Nylite 2 Plus were delighted with how comfortable the sneaker is
The sneaker makes a great fashion statement
Plenty of testers liked the fit of the low-top sneaker, which can accommodate even wider widths comfortably
A significant number of people were impressed with the high-quality of the Tretorn Nylite2 Plus
Some consumers commented that the casual low-top sneaker looks great when paired with most outfits and especially looks good with jeans, dresses, and skirts
The Nylite 2 Plus is surprisingly light, a few pleased buyers noted, which may be due to the new insole
A handful of customers claimed the lifestyle sneaker is supportive
A couple of persons said that the leather material makes it easy to clean the shoe
The Tretorn Nylite 2 Plus is priced reasonably, two stated
The low-top casual sneaker functions well for some sports such as tennis, one individual reported
cons: Several people claimed that the Tretorn Nylite 2 Plus runs longer than standard measurements
A few purchasers were disappointed to find that the gold in the White/Gold colorway looks more like silver

customer_reviews.title: I love these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Takes me back to the 80's when I wore the canvas Tretorn's all the time. These sneakers run large! I could have sized down by a half size easily. I've get so many compliments when I wear them. I might go ahead and buy another pair in a 9 instead of a 9.5
customer_reviews.author: Apex Mom

customer_reviews.title: Go a half size up.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these... I’m normally a 5.5-6 in a sneaker/runner/tennis shoe. These fit, but there is no extra room. Consider a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: FLD

customer_reviews.title: Great tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: I loved wearing Tretorn’s in 80s. They were comfortable, versatile and fun. I am excited to find them again. I particularly like the new insoles which are just as comfortable as the original, but the new material makes the whole shoe much lighter. I first thought the shoes were too wide; however, after redoing the laces I was able to tighten and they fit perfectly. I now have them in two colors.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: I loved these shoes in 8th grade and I love them ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes in 8th grade and I love them now. They fit as expected, although across the top of my arch is a little wide. Nothing you can’t tighten with shoe laces, I think. Overall I am super happy. I might even start right rolling my jeans too. Not really
customer_reviews.author: Susanna Porter

customer_reviews.title: Just as cute as Vejas but better
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these- cute and on trend. Much more comfortable than the Vejas I tried and returned. And lighter as well- wore them all day with no break-in period and they were super comfortable. I like that they are mainly nylon with leather trim. The green design looks great too- sporty and versatile without being too heavy and trendy. Glad I bought them- they wb 5 stars if more support for my high arch and a bit tight across top of my foot (bc of high arch). Ordered size 10 after reading the reviews- fit well and roomy, not too loose. I normally wear 10 in Nike sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Maven

customer_reviews.title: Great look for casual work and play
customer_reviews.text: Wore this during a work trip with a patterned belted shirtdress (that I typically wear with dressy heeled sandals) and people loved the look on me. I needed something comfy — but something I could dress up without looking like a 1990 secretary — since I knew I was going to be on my feet for nine hours straight and walking a lot. They were perfect for this and I plan to wear this with my casual outfits, too!
customer_reviews.author: Buneeb

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these old school Tretorns however after wearing them for a couple of days they seem to have stretched out. I normally wear 7.5-8 mostly 7.5, however the 7.5 in this shoe feels looses d too big. I ordered in a different color in a 7 and they fit much better. I would’ve sent these back if I could’ve.
customer_reviews.author: Chrys Mims

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I used to wear these sneakers when I was younger and always wanted to purchase them again 15+ years later, but I couldn't find them. I am so happy with them. They are comfortable just how I remembered.
customer_reviews.author: Janel

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I really like the pair of Tretorn Rawlings I got from J Crew, but they are pretty colorful so I was looking for a more classic color combo, and these are exactly the color I wanted. But these are much narrower than my first pair, which have only been worn a handful of times. At full price, I don’t want to try to stretch these, especially after the first pair felt great right out of the box. Both pairs are a size 7.5.
customer_reviews.author: mamao6

customer_reviews.title: Glad they're making a comeback!
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, I ordered down a size because I remember these running a little long on the toe. I'm a true size 5M, however, I saw the 4.5 ones - $60 less than the regular price. I took a chance and ordered them anyway. They're a little tight, probably should've ordered my normal size but yet, they're still comfortable. For the price that I bought them, I can deal lol! Keep in mind, the white leather is not a true white like other sneakers. It's a very (very) faint light grey/blue tint (which does not bother me and Tretorn's are known to not have true white color on their sneakers). Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Maggs

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: I had to reorder. I normally wear an 8.5. That was too large. Even the re-ordered 8 feels large in the toe. It's a pretty shoe; just be aware that the toe runs very large.
customer_reviews.author: WVBOOGWOODY

customer_reviews.title: Tretorn shoes are so comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Tretorn sneakers, and these are wonderful! I got the snow white/gold. They are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No go
customer_reviews.text: I only where Tretorns and these were awful. Fake looking and uncomfortable. Not even sure they were real. Returned immediately. Blisters after ten minutes and ridiculously bright and stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie McRandle

customer_reviews.title: Order a size or two down and don't trust the size chart when ordering.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a US 9 which arrived, was marked as a US 9 and also a EU 42. I have never known a US 9 to equal a EUR 42. When i was purchasing, i checked the size chart.. it said US 9 = EUR 40. Fair enough, so i purchased. Long story short, don't buy these shoes online unless you want a clown feet look. A US 9 is more like an 11. I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Mc

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great.I only wish my foot liked them. Too small. They are a 5 star shoe. Shop Bop did a great job delivering a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.title: Coming Back From the 80s!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the fit and low profile of this shoe! I love it with jeans, shorts, khakis and sweats. This is a go-to casual shoe.
customer_reviews.author: sk94

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that is has no arch support so I am going to put a new insole in it to give a little support. I knew it was going to be this way and they are exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela K. Giles

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Tretorn, and while I thought I was ordering canvas, these are not. However, they are STILL great sneakers. Perfect look for shorts and a tank top.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My shoe size is 7.5-8. I ordered the 8. They fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer bennett

customer_reviews.title: Love these Tretorns
customer_reviews.text: Love these Tretorns! I have t had a pair since high school and they are the same great quality leather shoes as years ago!
customer_reviews.author: mandiemd22

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Like these shoes Very Much. They fit well, and are of good quality.....They should be a reliable shoe for a long time. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: TNKnitter

customer_reviews.title: very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: shoes ripped on the seam near the sole, lasted for about 4 months of wearing
customer_reviews.author: Jay C

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It runs a bit large for my size 7.5 feet.
customer_reviews.author: astral

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable from the get go
customer_reviews.text: I slipped them right on and was able to use them right away! No need to break them in at all. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Romina C Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: LOVED THEM!
customer_reviews.text: LOVED THEM!!! Good quality leather, no rubbing or sore feet after wearing them 12hrs the 1st day. Will buy more
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Loved the orginals back in the 80's and love the comeback!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes going back is not a bad a thing. I had every color and print when I was a teenager and I may need every color again. They are still as cute and comfortable as every. Maybe a little wider now than before but I will be ordering another pair. I walked all around New York City in them brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Dena S.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sneakers! Just as I remembered them. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Good ole Tretorn
customer_reviews.text: Just received but fit is as expected . Quality seems good. I hope they are as good as the ones I have had a very long time. Nice looking and good price
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife but I thought it was canvas not plether
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Paul Goff

customer_reviews.title: Gotta Love Tretorns!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love Them!! I just wish they were all white leather, instead of all black. Either way, it's still an excellent sneaker that takes me back to the 80's. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality. Ripped in two months.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. I bought these in Sep and by Nov, it has ripped near the shoe lace area.
customer_reviews.author: Sonoma vines

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfortable and shipped fast!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, I ordered my regular size and they fit perfect and are very stylish. I ordered on a Thursday afternoon and received them the next day. I will be buying more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute for summer, and comfortable too!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and comfortable without socks. I love it and didn't realize it was leather which was a definite plus! Fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy F.

customer_reviews.title: Not Exactly Like the "Good Ol' Days"
customer_reviews.text: I really like Tretorns and wore them in the 70s and 80s. These are fine and true to size. They aren't really uncomfortable, but they aren't nearly as comfortable as I remember.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: So cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I wore them as a kid and they’re just as cute now! They fit true to size and were comfy as soon as I put them on! Colors are great!
customer_reviews.author: Jacinta

customer_reviews.title: NOT A GOOD FIT, WILL NEVER BUY SHOES ONLINE AGAIN.  I NEED TO TRY THEM FIRST.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good fit. I won't be buying shoes on line ever again. I think perhaps I shall give these to the Homeless. It just is not a good fit for me but Not sure why, too narrow perhaps. God bless you. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Mancuso

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Love them but they fit a little too large. I got in 6.5 and I could have gone with a 6.
customer_reviews.author: N.ROMA

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe, but order a size down because they run big!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Queen

customer_reviews.title: love them. Used to wear them when I worked ...
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled to have found these in leather....love them. Used to wear them when I worked on the floor nursing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had shoes like these as a teen
customer_reviews.text: I had shoes like these as a teen. I love the look and they fit great. Nice leather fabric, good rubber soles.
customer_reviews.author: JMMaser

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful style! I love these shoes. I wish they had a little more arch support though.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Tretorn ... comfortable... classic style
customer_reviews.text: Tretorn .... classic never goes out of style! Perfect fit and so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Sassy & Classy

customer_reviews.title: A classic...loved Tretorns then and love them now!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these! Highly recommend😊. Arrived very quickly, and I wore then the same day, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Mills

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable shoes with a surprising amount of cushion. One shoe was noticibly larger than the other.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my shoes
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly, fit really well, very classic – high style with the silver swish !!!!!!!! Will shop here again for sure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome style
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was suppose to be all white with the gold emblem. But it has a lil tint of blue and I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is comfortable and goes with just about any outfit.
customer_reviews.author: lovelyme

customer_reviews.title: I got my sneaker and was a little disappointed because my right sneaker was made noticeably more narrow ...
customer_reviews.text: I got my sneaker and was a little disappointed because my right sneaker was made noticeably more narrow at the toe part. Also the stitching was off.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Love them! These are the most comfortable tennis shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them! These are the most comfortable tennis shoes I've ever owned. Loved them in 70's and love them now!
customer_reviews.author: cbas1

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting classic
customer_reviews.text: They fit great. These are more comfortable than Converse to me. However, the gold looks silver, which is why I didn't give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: I finally found a multi-Functional fashion sneaker
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable and stylish for multiple uses. Unlike traditional fashion sneakers, this one is good for sports and is very light. I wear it when I play tennis. It also fits many outfits in addition to the casual ones. It goes with my wool coat from different brands including DVF, Max Mara, and Burberry. Some people tell me that I can wear it when it drizzles or snows (of course it won't work for a blizzard:)), but I haven't got a chance to try.
customer_reviews.author: nekoastume

customer_reviews.title: A most perfect fit, always loved this shoe
customer_reviews.text: A most perfect fit, always loved this shoe, worn it back in the day, absolutely love the modern up date, thinking of getting a back up pair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reputation still on point
customer_reviews.text: They were great in the 80’s and they are still great today!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these from my childhood
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my regular size 10 in women and needed at size 9 1/2. I love these from my childhood. Great find!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Harris

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: my gf is size 5 and usually wears size 6.
customer_reviews.author: dErKiSt

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a size 9 and they're more like a 10
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 9 and they're more like a 10. . . Very roomy... Have to return for an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TRETORN Womens Nylite2 Plus Nylite2 Plus
